    Interface Description
    com.brightcove.player.display.ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.Id3MetadataListener
    Use ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.MetadataListener instead.

    Use TrackSelectionOverrideCreator instead
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    com.brightcove.omniture.CustomPlayerDelegate
    com.brightcove.player.controller.ExoPlayerSourceSelectionController
    Instead of subclassing DefaultSourceSelectionController, please create your customized SourceSelector and use it to construct the DefaultSourceSelectionController with DefaultSourceSelectionController.createWithSourceSelector(EventEmitter, SourceSelector)

    com.brightcove.cast.GoogleCastEventType.SET_CAST_BUTTON
    No longer used to set the Cast button. For more information on how to set the Cast button in your application, please visit: MediaRouteActionProvider reference
    com.brightcove.cast.GoogleCastEventType.SET_MINI_CONTROLLER
    No longer used to set the MiniController. For more information on how to set the MiniController in your application, please visit: MiniControllerFragment reference

    No longer used to set the notifications.
    com.brightcove.cast.GoogleCastEventType.UNSET_NOTIFICATIONS
    No longer used to unset the notifications.

    Use SSAIEvent.VAST_TRACKING_EVENTS to obtain all tracking elements.

    com.brightcove.freewheel.cuepoint.AdCuePointComponent.skipCurrentAds()
    This method will be removed in a future release. Please update your code at the earliest to use AdCuePointComponent.skipCurrentAdBreak() method instead.
    com.brightcove.ima.GoogleIMAComponent.getContentPosition()
    com.brightcove.ima.GoogleIMAComponent.initializeAdsRequests()
    It's no longer necessary to call this method. The initialization of Ad Rules happens automatically now.

    Use GoogleIMAVideoAdPlayer.playAd(AdMediaInfo)}

    Use GoogleIMAVideoAdPlayer.playAd(AdMediaInfo)

    Use GoogleIMAVideoAdPlayer.stopAd(AdMediaInfo)

    com.brightcove.player.display.ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.InfoListener.onDecoderInitialized​(AnalyticsListener.EventTime, int, String, long)
    Use ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.InfoListener.onAudioDecoderInitialized(com.google.android.exoplayer2.analytics.AnalyticsListener.EventTime, java.lang.String, long) and ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.InfoListener.onVideoDecoderInitialized(com.google.android.exoplayer2.analytics.AnalyticsListener.EventTime, java.lang.String, long) * instead.

    Use ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.InfoListener.onDroppedFrames(AnalyticsListener.EventTime, int, long)

    It is not longer used for ExoPlayer v2.

    It is not longer used for ExoPlayer v2.
    com.brightcove.player.display.ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.setMinBufferMs​(int)
    It is not longer used for ExoPlayer v2.
    com.brightcove.player.display.ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.setMinRebufferMs​(int)
    It is not longer used for ExoPlayer v2. Use ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.setLoadControlConfig(LoadControlConfig)
    com.brightcove.player.display.ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.setVideoSelectionOverrideCreator​(SelectionOverrideCreator)
    Use {ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.setVideoTrackSelectionOverrideCreator(TrackSelectionOverrideCreator) instead}

    Use {BrightcoveClosedCaptioningView.findCaptionsForPosition(long)} instead.
    com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcoveClosedCaptioningView.initialize​(EventEmitter)
    Please use the initiliaze(EventEmitter, BaseVideoView) method instead.
    com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcoveClosedCaptioningView.prepareLayout()
    As of 4.8.0, no longer does anything.
    com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcoveClosedCaptioningView.refreshCaptions​(int)
    com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcoveSurfaceView.isVideo360Supported()
    Not needed anymore since the sdk supports api level 19.
    com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcoveVideoView.getSurfaceView()
    Please use BrightcoveVideoView.getRenderView() instead.
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    com.brightcove.cast.GoogleCastComponent​(EventEmitter, String, Context, boolean)
    Use GoogleCastComponent.Builder.build()
    com.brightcove.freewheel.controller.FreeWheelController​(Activity, SurfaceView, EventEmitter)
    com.brightcove.ima.GoogleIMAComponent​(BaseVideoView, EventEmitter)
    Please use the GoogleIMAComponent.Builder instead
    com.brightcove.player.captioning.BrightcoveClosedCaption​(int, int, List<List<Span>>)
    com.brightcove.player.drm.ExoPlayerDrmSessionManager​(UUID, ExoMediaDrm.Provider, MediaDrmCallback, HashMap<String, String>)
    com.brightcove.player.drm.OfflineLicenseManager​(ExoMediaDrm.Provider, MediaDrmCallback, HashMap<String, String>, DrmSessionEventListener.EventDispatcher)
    com.brightcove.player.edge.AbstractOfflineCatalog​(Context, EventEmitter, String, String, String)
    com.brightcove.player.edge.Catalog​(EventEmitter, String, String)
    Please use Catalog.Builder to create the Catalog.
    com.brightcove.player.edge.GetPlaylistTask​(EventEmitter, String, Map<String, String>, String, String)
    Please use GetPlaylistTask(EventEmitter, String, HttpRequestConfig, String, String) instead.
    com.brightcove.player.edge.GetVideoTask​(EventEmitter, String, Map<String, String>, String, String)
    Please use GetVideoTask(EventEmitter, String, HttpRequestConfig, String, String) instead.
    com.brightcove.player.edge.OfflineCatalog​(Context, EventEmitter, String)
    Please use OfflineCatalog.Builder to create the Catalog.
    com.brightcove.player.model.CuePoint​(CuePoint.PositionType, String, Map<String, Object>)
    Use the construtor that use a CuePointType rather than a string. This will guarantee that the CuePoint is of a known type and can be handled properly by the system. This method now throws IllegalArgumentException if the string value describing the cue point type does not specify a known cue point type. Currently supported values are "AD" or "CODE".
